topic.title: Hospital Admission Diagnosis Section - conformance rules

section.p: The hospital admitting diagnosis section shall contain a narrative description of the primary reason for admission to a hospital facility. It shall include entries for observations as described in the Entry Content Modules.

ol.li: SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "46241-6" HOSPITAL ADMISSION DX (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC)
